entry.title: Vital Hemp Women's T-shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 44.00

That vintage tee you won't want to take off.

This hemp baby doll t-shirt fits great, giving you a little extra coverage up top for the sun-sensitive or for chillier days, when you want a cozy hemp base layer that regulates body temperature.

A bit longer in the torso than the average hemp tee, this style is made from our lightweight hemp/cotton knit that drapes wonderfully on the body. We spend a lot of time to make sure our t-shirts fit outstandingly well. These t-shirts work great for travel, workout, yoga, and as a performance base layer for biking, hiking or any other aerobic sport. Wear it out for a night on the town. 

  • Fit and wear exceedingly well
  • Long torso for draped fit
  • Wicks moisture, letting your skin breathe
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Sustainably Made
  • Lightweight Jersey Knit 
  • 55% Hemp / 45% Cotton

    We design everything in Santa Monica, California, and make all our hemp clothing ethically, with family-owned contractors in Los Angeles, USA.

    • Shipping
    • Returns
    • Garment
      • All U.S. orders $200 or more receive FREE USPS priority shipping.
      • Vital Hemp accepts Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and PayPal.
      • All markdown styles are final sale. No refunds or exchanges.
      • Customers returning items for credit or exchange are responsible for return shipping costs ($8.00). 
      • All US orders are typically shipped within 48 business hours (excluding weekends).  USPS Priority domestic mail often delivers packages within 2-3 business days from the date of mailing.
      • International orders ship within 5 to 7 business days and may take up to 14 business days to deliver depending on the shipping service.
      • Unworn, unwashed garments, with tags,  may be exchanged or returned for store credit if returned within  21 days with a receipt.
      • Items must be returned in the same condition in which you received them, any signs of wear will not be accepted for return. 
      • Defective merchandise will receive a full refund. To expedite processing, please include a note with return address and requested action (ex: please exchange for the same item in a smaller size; or please issue me a gift card for store credit).
      • Exchanges for any items eligible for return will be based on availability of the stock.
      • We do not accept returns of gift cards, masks, promotional items and final sale items.
      • Vital Hemp is not responsible for a lost or stolen packages once it has been delivered.
      • Hemp is the most durable natural fiber. These hemp clothes will last you a long time if you take care of them. As many in the hemp industry say about hemp: “You don’t wear it out; you wear it in.” Our garments are garment-dyed, they have already been shrunk to the max. The will not shrink any more; though the fabric may relax a bit over time.
      • Suggestions for care: In general, you don’t need to baby hemp. Machine wash cold or warm. Tumble dry warm, or line dry (best not to dry in high heat). Avoid bleach, velcro and any hardware that can snag. Avoid uneven exposure to the sun as the sunlight may fade the color.
      • Ironing: Our knits don’t generally need to be ironed. If you want to iron our 100% hemp wovens to make them look brand new again, use a hot iron on the linen setting and use steam.
      • Hempjucation: The first jeans were made from hemp; but they lasted too long; so the business switched to cotton. Cotton uses 25% of all pesticides, polluting ecosystems. Hemp doesn’t need pesticides. The original linen was made from hemp. Hemp wicks better than all other plant fibers, letting your skin breath. Hemp is anti-microbial, so clothes stay fresher longer.

entry.title: Hemp History Week 2018 Hemp V-neck Tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 44.00 - 48.00 (4 variants)

"A classic hemp tee from 2018, commemorating Hemp History Week, the largest nationwide grassroots public education, advocacy, and marketing effort to raise awareness about the diverse uses of hemp. With a mission to educate the general public about the unparalleled environmental, entrepreneurial and economic impacts of hemp, HHW renewed strong support for the farming, processing and production of hemp in the United States." 

—Hemp Industries Association

We constructed our hemp t-shirt in a durable hemp/organic cotton blend. This hemp knit works well as a base layer, regulating body temperature during any kind of activity. It’s a stylish go-to tee that commemorates a special moment in our history with the plant, connecting us to the deep roots of our shared history. 

  • Made and printed in Los Angeles
  • Wicks moisture, letting your skin breathe
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Lightweight Jersey Knit 
  • 55% Hemp / 45% Organic Cotton

    We design everything in Santa Monica, California, and make all our hemp clothing ethically, with family-owned contractors in Los Angeles, USA.

The will not shrink any more; though the fabric may relax a bit over time.
      • Suggestions for care: In general, you don’t need to baby hemp. Machine wash cold or warm. Tumble dry warm, or line dry (best not to dry in high heat). Avoid bleach, velcro and any hardware that can snag. Avoid uneven exposure to the sun as the sunlight may fade the color.

Hemp doesn’t need pesticides. The original linen was made from hemp. Hemp wicks better than all other plant fibers, letting your skin breath. Hemp is anti-microbial, so clothes stay fresher longer.

entry.title: Women's V-neck Hemp T-shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 44.00

Vivacious, Victorious, Vital...a V for every mood.

We make our V-neck t-shirt from our lightweight hemp/organic cotton knit. The V is well-shaped, and receives a lot of compliments from our customers who appreciate the fit. We design our t-shirts to fit and wear well for years.

Wicking moisture and letting your skin breathe, these hemp t-shirts work great when it’s hot, and as a base layer for yoga, biking, hiking or any other aerobic sport. Dress it up or dress it down. Either way, we've been told a thousand times, "This is my favorite t-shirt. I can't wait until it gets out of the dryer.

  • Short torso for an active fit

entry.title: Women’s Anywhere Hemp Pant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 96.00

We've perfected the fit and feel of the anywhere pants over the course of a decade and they feel amazing.

These 100% Hemp pants with a linen weave can be worn anywhere, anytime.

When we noticed that women kept buying our men’s small pant, we decided to make a women's version. 

From the morning yoga class, where the rise is long enough to allow for any pose, to the garden where they're tough enough to be on your knees, to a night out with friends, you're covered in durable, lightweight, breathable style.

  • Deep Pockets
  • YKK Zippers
  • Coconut Button
  • Drawstring, Flexibility in fit
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Open weave resists wrinkles

entry.title: Vital Hemp Women's Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 60.00 - 69.00 (40 variants)

Our women’s hemp hoody has you covered in understated style. 

We spend a lot of time making sure our hemp hoodies fit and wear outstandingly well for years. This hemp hoodie is made from a hemp/organic cotton knit that wicks moisture, letting your skin breathe.  These hoodies work great as travel gear, or over a short sleeve for comfort in a wide range of temperatures. Our customers love it as a second layer for wearing around town, because it keeps you snuggly without getting hot. Or wear it for more aerobic activity -- hiking, biking, you name it.  Performance-oriented, stylish, sustainable hemp, for living every day.

entry.title: Women’s Hemp Long Sleeve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 60.00

Getting chilly?  Reach for this cozy layer.

Made from our mid-weight hemp/organic cotton knit, this comfortable layer regulates body temperature while letting your skin breathe. Wicking moisture and staying fresh, these hemp sweaters work great as a cozy insulating layer for those who like to keep warm and comfy without bulk.

This top also works as a great layer for walking, biking, hiking or any other outdoor sport. Dress it up or dress it down. Either way, you'll be reaching for this sweater whenever there's a slight chill or when you want to give your arms some cover. 

Size runs large with a roomy fit. We suggest buying a size smaller than you normally wear.

  • Wicks moisture, letting your skin breathe

entry.title: Humboldt Brewing Company - Printed Hemp Tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 44.00

We love hemp ale. And the peeps who ran the Humboldt Brewing Company loved our hemp tees. They ordered so many for their fans and peeps! We made a few more for ourselves, to share. These are now limited edition! 

This printed hemp v-neck t-shirt features our vintage hemp/tencel knit, that regulates body temperature when it’s hot, and serves as a base layer for yoga, biking, hiking or any other aerobic sport. Dress it up or dress it down. This v-neck tee receives a lot of compliments from our customers who appreciate the longer, slimmer fit.

As many in the hemp industry say about hemp: “You don’t wear it out; you wear it in.” Our garments are garment-dyed, they have already been shrunk to the max. The will not shrink any more; though the fabric may relax a bit over time.
      • Suggestions for care: In general, you don’t need to baby hemp. Machine wash cold or warm. Tumble dry warm, or line dry (best not to dry in high heat). Avoid bleach, velcro and any hardware that can snag. Avoid uneven exposure to the sun as the sunlight may fade the color.
      • Ironing: Our knits don’t generally need to be ironed. If you want to iron our 100% hemp wovens to make them look brand new again, use a hot iron on the linen setting and use steam.
      • Hempjucation: The first jeans were made from hemp; but they lasted too long; so the business switched to cotton. Cotton uses 25% of all pesticides, polluting ecosystems. Hemp doesn’t need pesticides. The original linen was made from hemp. Hemp wicks better than all other plant fibers, letting your skin breath. Hemp is anti-microbial, so clothes stay fresher longer.

entry.title: Hemp Tencel Wrap Dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 83.00

A year in development yielded a perfect fit.

Rather than a straight hemline, we gave this Diane Von Furstenberg-inspired wrap dress the hi-low treatment. Customers try them on and frequently buy more than one. Great alone or over a tank and a pair of leggings, or to throw on over your workout gear for dinner after your workout.

One customer stopped me on the street just to tell me how many compliments she received while wearing the dress at a Bar-B-Q. And the old Executive Director of the Hemp Industries Association had many and wore them at official functions. :)

  • Wrap dress, Flexibility in fit
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Fits a wide variety of body types
  • Lightweight Jersey Knit that lets your skin breathe
  • 60% Hemp / 40% Tencel 

    We design everything in Santa Monica, California, and make all our hemp clothing ethically, with family-owned contractors in Los Angeles, USA.

      • Ironing: Our knits don’t generally need to be ironed. If you want to iron our 100% hemp wovens to make them look brand new again, use a hot iron on the linen setting and use steam.

entry.title: Women's Drawstring Hemp Pant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: womens
Price: 88.00

Like pajama pants you can wear everyday, this comfy style will wear well for years.

This hemp pant for women is made from a breathable medium-weight hemp/organic cotton knit.  They work great for around the house, for traveling, bodywork, or for your local kundalini class. They're especially yummy as pj's.

The go-to piece when you just want to throw on something incredibly comfy for your morning walk, or whenever you want to give your legs some loving cover. 

  • Pockets with contrast stitching
  • Drawstring, Flexibility in fit
  • Wicks moisture, letting your skin breathe
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Sustainably Made
  • Mid-weight Jersey Knit
